meanings.definition: The state of being present everywhere at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The omnipresence of love can be felt in every corner of the world.
meanings.sent2: The belief in the omnipresence of spirits is common in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The omnipresence of technology in our lives sometimes feels overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with an omnipresence that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The omnipresence of the sun's warmth enveloped the entire garden.

meanings.definition: The quality of being widespread or constantly encountered.
meanings.sent1: The omnipresence of advertisements makes it hard to escape commercial messages.
meanings.sent2: In a small town, the omnipresence of gossip can spread news quickly.
meanings.sent3: The omnipresence of squirrels in the park always brings a smile to visitors.
meanings.sent4: The omnipresence of kindness in her actions touched everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The omnipresence of music in the city created a lively atmosphere.
